title: Ticket #4671: Master config append file in batlab glue
description:
We want to have a file in the condor_test directory which will append to the default config for all tests and all platforms. We are naming it testconfigappend to balance testoverride which sets up a smaller list of tests. The new default config file will be a catonation of the main config followed by the appended material.

This is done at the end of remote_pre so we do it only once.

The new config is displayed at the end of the output of remote_pre
